mapper.select: SELECT business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM ( SELECT * FROM promotion_board P JOIN master M ON P.business_no = M.business_no LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_deal H ON H.business_no = P.business_no ORDER BY avg_star_rate DESC ) sub WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7

SELECT business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, sub.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM promotion_board P JOIN master M ON P.business_no = M.business_no LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_deal H ON H.business_no = P.business_no ORDER BY avg_star_rate DESC ) sub) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND (#{pageNum} * #{amount})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM promotion_board P JOIN master M ON P.business_no = M.business_no LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_deal H ON H.business_no = P.business_no WHERE promotion_bno IN ( SELECT promotion_bno FROM premiume_promotion_board WHERE end_date >= (SELECT TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') "NOW" FROM DUAL)) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) sub WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, sub.* FROM ( SELECT P.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM promotion_board P JOIN master M ON P.business_no = M.business_no LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_deal H ON H.business_no = P.business_no WHERE promotion_bno IN ( SELECT promotion_bno FROM premiume_promotion_board WHERE end_date >= (SELECT TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') "NOW" FROM DUAL)) ORDER BY end_date ) sub) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND (#{pageNum} * #{amount})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM premiume_promotion_board WHERE end_date >= (SELECT TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') "NOW" FROM DUAL)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM promotion_board P JOIN master M ON P.business_no = M.business_no LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_deal H ON H.business_no = P.business_no WHERE store_address LIKE '%' || #{storeAddress}|| '%' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) sub WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, sub.* FROM ( SELECT P.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM promotion_board P JOIN master M ON P.business_no = M.business_no LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_deal H ON H.business_no = P.business_no WHERE store_address LIKE '%' || #{storeAddress}|| '%' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) sub) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page.pageNum} - 1) * #{page.amount} + 1 AND (#{page.pageNum} * #{page.amount})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM master M JOIN promotion_board P ON M.business_no = P.business_no WHERE store_address LIKE '%' || #{storeAddress}|| '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM promotion_board P JOIN hot_deal H ON P.business_no = H.business_no JOIN master M ON H.business_no = M.business_no WHERE end_date >= (SELECT TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) ORDER BY end_date ) sub WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, sub.* FROM ( SELECT P.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM promotion_board P JOIN hot_deal H ON P.business_no = H.business_no JOIN master M ON H.business_no = M.business_no WHERE end_date >= (SELECT TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) ORDER BY end_date ) sub) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND (#{pageNum} * #{amount})

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM promotion_board WHERE hashTag LIKE '%' || #{hashTag} || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, t_pb.* FROM ( SELECT P.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt, hot_deal, file_path, discount_price, start_date, end_date, hashTag FROM promotion_board P JOIN master M ON P.business_no = M.business_no LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_deal H ON H.business_no = P.business_no WHERE store_address LIKE '%' || #{s.keyword} || '%' OR store_name LIKE '%' || #{s.keyword} || '%' OR hashTag LIKE '%' || #{s.keyword} || '%' ORDER BY avg_star_rate DESC ORDER BY review_cnt ORDER BY P.last_updated ) t_pb) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{s.pageNum} - 1) * #{s.amount} + 1 AND (#{s.pageNum} * #{s.amount})
